oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of a performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Oklahoma Songbirds; Ann Bond; Lem Hawkins; Charlie Aldrich; Mary Lou
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Allan Page and Hiram Higsby introduce the show / (0:35) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Oh Susanna" / (1:45) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (2:05) The Oklahoma Songbirds perform "Roundup In Cheyenne" [unconfirmed] / (4:13) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (4:27) Ann Bond performs "Blue Love (In My Heart)" / (6:59) Lem Hawkins and Hiram Higsby tell a joke / (7:27) Lem Hawkins performs "Roving Gambler" / (9:34) Charlie Aldrich performs "Stumbling" [unconfirmed] / (10:50) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (11:22) Mary Lou performs "One Little Teardrop Too Late" [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; CBS Inc.; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); Davis, Chuck; Bond, Ann; Aldrich, Charlie;
